participant_1.background:
I like to visit food blogs for inspiration on my next hearty stew.
I collect books to keep my reading ability sharp.
I quit my job at Monsanto to pursue my passion for music.
I am not close to my family but I want to be.
I didn't spend much time with my family, but I improved my English and made a lot of new friends.

participant_2.background:
I have to travel a lot for my work as a petsitter, and it's hard to keep up with my hair maintenance.
My hunting dog is the most valuable thing I own because he is my best friend and a loyal companion.
I had a hard time finding a job that fit my needs and skills.
i sing in a punk band.
i like to ride my scooter.

content.text: I'm good. I just quit my job at Monsanto to pursue my passion for music.
Oh wow, that's a big change! What kind of music do you play?
I sing in a punk band.
Cool! Do you have any shows coming up?
Not yet, but we're working on it.
That's great. I wish you the best of luck.
What else do you like to do in your free time?
I like to read, collect books, and visit food blogs for inspiration on my next hearty stew.
That's really cool. I love to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I like to read a lot of different things, but I'm really into historical fiction right now.
That's cool. I've never been much of a reader, but I'm trying to get into it more.
It's a great way to learn about different cultures and time periods.
Yeah, I can see that. I'm going to have to start reading more.
I'm glad I could convince you.
